topic.title: CARER RESIDENT INDICATION CODE FOR NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the parent/Carer of a PATIENT is staying with the PATIENT during a Neonatal Critical Care Spell; and if so, whether they are delivering any of the care that the PATIENT requires.
